statements: SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity FROM Materials;
SELECT material_name, price FROM Materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM Materials WHERE supplier_id = 5;
SELECT material_id, material_name, price FROM Materials WHERE vendor_id = 3 AND quantity < 50;
SELECT material_name, supplier_id FROM Materials ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Materials WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY material_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT material_name, supplier_id FROM Materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY supplier_id
SELECT * FROM Materials WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND price < 100 ORDER BY supplier_id, quantity DESC
SELECT material_name, price FROM Materials WHERE supplier_id = 5 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT material_id, vendor_id FROM Materials WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY vendor_id ASC, material_id DESC
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_id, material_name, quantity FROM packaging_materials WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT material_name, price FROM packaging_materials WHERE quantity >= 100 AND price < 20.00 ORDER BY material_id ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity, price FROM packaging_materials WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_cost FROM packaging_materials JOIN suppliers ON packaging_materials.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND quantity >= 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id < 5 ORDER BY vendor_name;
SELECT material_name, quantity_available, price FROM packaging_materials WHERE price > 10.00;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, price FROM packaging_materials WHERE price > 10.00;
SELECT * FROM suppliers s JOIN vendors v ON s.supplier_id = v.vendor_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM supplier ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendor WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT material_name, price FROM packaging_material WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT order_id, order_date, delivery_date FROM purchase_order ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendor WHERE vendor_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT supplier_name, vendor_name, price FROM supplier s INNER JOIN packaging_material pm ON s.supplier_id = pm.supplier_id INNER JOIN vendor v ON pm.vendor_id = v.vendor_id WHERE price > 50.00;

SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM supplier s INNER JOIN packaging_material pm ON s.supplier_id = pm.supplier_id INNER JOIN purchase_order po ON pm.material_id = po.material_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_orders > 3;
SELECT * FROM packaging_material WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 20.00 ORDER BY material_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT invoice_amount, invoice_date FROM invoices WHERE invoice_amount > 1000;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, invoice_amount FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id JOIN invoices ON products.product_id = invoices.product_id WHERE invoice_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, quantity, order_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, SUM(invoice_amount) AS total_invoiced_amount FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id JOIN invoices ON products.product_id = invoices.product_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_invoiced_amount > 5000;
